review_data.title: Tolles Essen
review_data.content: Kleines, tolles Restaurant mit Konzentration auf das Wesentliche: gute japanische Küch. Sehr netter, zuvorkommender Service. Einfach wunderbar! Gerne immer wieder.

review_data.title: Pleasantly surprised.
review_data.content: Really good service, the waiter was really polite. Very understanding about food allergies. The food was really good, nice quantity and clearly worth the price which is clearly average for Zurich. Will probably return if I am again in Zurich.

review_data.title: Sashimi und Sushi
review_data.content: Delicious and high quality Sashimi and Sushi consistent high quality food and the same is true for the excellentand very friendly service.

review_data.title: Sushi HIER

There are many different categories for Japanese food and this restaurant is strong in "Bendon kind food" means Katsudon, Tempura, etc. I do not recommend their sushi or sashimi actually, there's another restaurant I recommend...More

review_data.title: Ramen or instant noodles
review_data.content: I would not call it ramen as it has nothing to do with Japanese ramen. I prefer to call it instant noodles with lots of MSG. Not worth the money!!!

review_data.title: Good place for lunch

review_data.title: Missing home - a familiar taste

review_data.title: Dissapointing lunch
review_data.content: The food was okay at best, honestly mostly disappointing as even the service lacked.... Price point elevated, which made the whole thing... not a good value for money.

review_data.title: Great Sushi for a good price
review_data.content: Really good sushi and soup for a good price in Zurich. I was there during lunch. The restaurant looks like a normal chinese restaurant from outside but it is nice inside and the staff is friendly. Will definitely go again.

review_data.title: Good for lunch
review_data.content: Takano has some lunch menus as well as an a la carte selection including sushi. The food is good but not exceptional. Service is very friendly and efficient. For a lunch menu including Miso soup, main dish and Jasmin tea I paid 32CHF. It was...More

review_data.title: authentic japanese food, super nice service
review_data.content: Been there several times, never been disappointed. The service is extremely nice and competent. But the food is the main reason to come here. Beside a variety of nice Sushi you get great Tempura, Gyoza, Una Zyu and Bento Boxes. My absolute favourite is Sukiyaki

review_data.title: Cute service but the food was nothing special

review_data.title: Excellent Japanese Food!
review_data.content: Excellent Japanese food with great sushi and sashimi! Overall, the Japanese dishes lend a variety. It is simple and clean with personable service. I love the sushi and sashimi with green tea ice cream with azuki beans! The tempura is also excellent!

review_data.title: Good service, average (non-authentic) food
review_data.content: Stuff members are very friendly and service is pretty good here. Food far from "real" Japanese food but not bad. Keep your expectations not too high and you won't be disappointed :)

review_data.title: Wide range of lunch menu and friendly service. But not so authentic.

When I tried beef bowl with my colleauge, we got fried prawns as a side dish, which is...More

review_data.content: The worst Japanese food I have ever had in my life. It is a shame to call Japanese food. Price is high too. I was very very upset. Their sushi, tonkatsu, tempura etc are nothing to do with Japanese.

review_data.title: Original Japanese Cuisine and good quality!
review_data.content: Every time that we visit this restaurant we are satisfied! The dishes are well-prepared and the portions ideal. The place is clean and tidy and Mr. Takano and his wife are always ready to take care of us!

review_data.title: Can Be Called Takaii City
review_data.content: Although the food itself wasn't bad, it was a bit expensive (hence "Takaii"), particularly the noodle dishes. But after all this is in the middle of Zurich.
